SIM_ROS_EN.description: Flag to enable the publishing of sim data in ROS topics.

SIM_ROS_HZ.description: Frequency of publication of sim data in ROS topics.

SIM_SENS_HZ.description: Frequency of publication of sensor data through MAVLINK. Includes IMU, magnetometer and barometer.

SIM_GPS_HZ.description: Frequency of publication of GPS data through MAVLINK.

SIM_GT_EN.description: Flag to enable the publishing ground truth data trough MAVLINK.

SIM_GT_HZ.description: Frequency of publication of ground truth data through MAVLINK.

SIM_PRINT_EN.description: Flag to enable the printing of sim data on the terminal.

SIM_PRINT_HZ.description: Frequency of printing of sim data on terminal.

SIM_INIT_POS_X.description: Initial X position of the vehicle in the local frame. The X direction points East. Value in meters.

SIM_INIT_POS_Y.description: Initial Y position of the vehicle in the local frame. The Y direction points North. Value in meters.

SIM_INIT_YAW.description: Initial yaw angle of the vehicle in the local frame. Angle is measured in radians from the X axes that points East.

ENV_PRES_SEA.description: Sea level standard atmospheric pressure in hectopascal.

ENV_GRAVITY.description: Earth-surface gravitational acceleration in meters per second square.

ENV_MOL_MASS.description: Molar mass of dry air in kilograms per mol.

ENV_TMP_SEA.description: Sea level standard temperature in Kelvin degrees.

ENV_GAS_CTE.description: Universal gas constant in Joules per mol Kelvin.

DYN_MASS.description: Total mass of the vehicle in kilograms.

DYN_DRAG_V.description: Drag coefficient for linear motion in Newtons second per meter.

DYN_DRAG_W.description: Drag coefficient for angular motion Newtons seconds per radian.

DYN_J_XX.description: Moment of inertia around the x axis in kilograms meter square.

DYN_J_YY.description: Moment of inertia around the y axis in kilograms meter square.

DYN_J_ZZ.description: Moment of inertia around the z axis in kilograms meter square.

DYN_WIND_E.description: Constant air speed in the East direction in meters per second.

DYN_WIND_N.description: Constant air speed in the North direction in meters per second.

DYN_WIND_U.description: Constant vertical air speed pointing up in meters per second.

VEH_ACT_NUM.description: Number of actuator the vehicle has. Maximum value is 8.

VEH_J_ROTOR.description: Moment of inertia of the spinning part of a single actuator in kilograms meter square.

VEH_ACT0_SPIN.description:
Direction of rotation of actuator 0.
 (1): Rotates positively (counter-clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT0_DIR
(-1): Rotates negatively (clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT0_DIR

VEH_ACT1_SPIN.description:
Direction of rotation of actuator 1.
 (1): Rotates positively (counter-clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT1_DIR
(-1): Rotates negatively (clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT1_DIR

VEH_ACT2_SPIN.description:
Direction of rotation of actuator 2.
 (1): Rotates positively (counter-clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT2_DIR
(-1): Rotates negatively (clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT2_DIR

VEH_ACT3_SPIN.description:
Direction of rotation of actuator 3.
 (1): Rotates positively (counter-clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT3_DIR
(-1): Rotates negatively (clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT3_DIR

VEH_ACT4_SPIN.description:
Direction of rotation of actuator 4.
 (1): Rotates positively (counter-clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT4_DIR
(-1): Rotates negatively (clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT4_DIR

VEH_ACT5_SPIN.description:
Direction of rotation of actuator 5.
 (1): Rotates positively (counter-clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT5_DIR
(-1): Rotates negatively (clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT5_DIR

VEH_ACT6_SPIN.description:
Direction of rotation of actuator 6.
 (1): Rotates positively (counter-clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT6_DIR
(-1): Rotates negatively (clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT6_DIR

VEH_ACT7_SPIN.description:
Direction of rotation of actuator 7.
 (1): Rotates positively (counter-clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT7_DIR
(-1): Rotates negatively (clockwise) around the vector VEH_ACT7_DIR

VEH_ACT0_POS_X.description: X component (forward) of the position of actuator 0 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT0_POS_Y.description: Y component (right) of the position of actuator 0 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT0_POS_Z.description: Z component (up) of the position of actuator 0 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT1_POS_X.description: X component (forward) of the position of actuator 1 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT1_POS_Y.description: Y component (right) of the position of actuator 1 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT1_POS_Z.description: Z component (up) of the position of actuator 1 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT2_POS_X.description: X component (forward) of the position of actuator 2 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT2_POS_Y.description: Y component (right) of the position of actuator 2 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT2_POS_Z.description: Z component (up) of the position of actuator 2 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT3_POS_X.description: X component (forward) of the position of actuator 3 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT3_POS_Y.description: Y component (right) of the position of actuator 3 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT3_POS_Z.description: Z component (up) of the position of actuator 3 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT4_POS_X.description: X component (forward) of the position of actuator 4 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT4_POS_Y.description: Y component (right) of the position of actuator 4 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT4_POS_Z.description: Z component (up) of the position of actuator 4 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT5_POS_X.description: X component (forward) of the position of actuator 5 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT5_POS_Y.description: Y component (right) of the position of actuator 5 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT5_POS_Z.description: Z component (up) of the position of actuator 5 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT6_POS_X.description: X component (forward) of the position of actuator 6 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT6_POS_Y.description: Y component (right) of the position of actuator 6 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT6_POS_Z.description: Z component (up) of the position of actuator 6 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT7_POS_X.description: X component (forward) of the position of actuator 7 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT7_POS_Y.description: Y component (right) of the position of actuator 7 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT7_POS_Z.description: Z component (up) of the position of actuator 7 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters.

VEH_ACT0_DIR_X.description: X component (forward) of the direction of action of actuator 0 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT0_DIR_Y and VEH_ACT0_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT0_DIR_Y.description: Y component (right) of the direction of action of actuator 0 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT0_DIR_X and VEH_ACT0_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT0_DIR_Z.description: Z component (up) of the direction of action of actuator 0 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT0_DIR_X and VEH_ACT0_DIR_Y.

VEH_ACT1_DIR_X.description: X component (forward) of the direction of action of actuator 1 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT1_DIR_Y and VEH_ACT1_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT1_DIR_Y.description: Y component (right) of the direction of action of actuator 1 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT1_DIR_X and VEH_ACT1_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT1_DIR_Z.description: Z component (up) of the direction of action of actuator 1 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT1_DIR_X and VEH_ACT1_DIR_Y.

VEH_ACT2_DIR_X.description: X component (forward) of the direction of action of actuator 2 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT2_DIR_Y and VEH_ACT2_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT2_DIR_Y.description: Y component (right) of the direction of action of actuator 2 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT2_DIR_X and VEH_ACT2_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT2_DIR_Z.description: Z component (up) of the direction of action of actuator 2 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT2_DIR_X and VEH_ACT2_DIR_Y.

VEH_ACT3_DIR_X.description: X component (forward) of the direction of action of actuator 3 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT3_DIR_Y and VEH_ACT3_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT3_DIR_Y.description: Y component (right) of the direction of action of actuator 3 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT3_DIR_X and VEH_ACT3_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT3_DIR_Z.description: Z component (up) of the direction of action of actuator 3 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT3_DIR_X and VEH_ACT3_DIR_Y.

VEH_ACT4_DIR_X.description: X component (forward) of the direction of action of actuator 4 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT4_DIR_Y and VEH_ACT4_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT4_DIR_Y.description: Y component (right) of the direction of action of actuator 4 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT4_DIR_X and VEH_ACT4_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT4_DIR_Z.description: Z component (up) of the direction of action of actuator 4 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT4_DIR_X and VEH_ACT4_DIR_Y.

VEH_ACT5_DIR_X.description: X component (forward) of the direction of action of actuator 5 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT5_DIR_Y and VEH_ACT5_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT5_DIR_Y.description: Y component (right) of the direction of action of actuator 5 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT5_DIR_X and VEH_ACT5_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT5_DIR_Z.description: Z component (up) of the direction of action of actuator 5 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT5_DIR_X and VEH_ACT5_DIR_Y.

VEH_ACT6_DIR_X.description: X component (forward) of the direction of action of actuator 6 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT6_DIR_Y and VEH_ACT6_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT6_DIR_Y.description: Y component (right) of the direction of action of actuator 6 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT6_DIR_X and VEH_ACT6_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT6_DIR_Z.description: Z component (up) of the direction of action of actuator 6 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT6_DIR_X and VEH_ACT6_DIR_Y.

VEH_ACT7_DIR_X.description: X component (forward) of the direction of action of actuator 7 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT7_DIR_Y and VEH_ACT7_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT7_DIR_Y.description: Y component (right) of the direction of action of actuator 7 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT7_DIR_X and VEH_ACT7_DIR_Z.

VEH_ACT7_DIR_Z.description: Z component (up) of the direction of action of actuator 7 in the vehicle frame. Value in meters. Should form a unit vector with values VEH_ACT7_DIR_X and VEH_ACT7_DIR_Y.

SENS_LAT_ORIGIN.description: Latitude coordinate of the origin of the local simulated frame in degrees.

SENS_LON_ORIGIN.description: Longitude coordinate of the origin of the local simulated frame in degrees.

SENS_ALT_ORIGIN.description: Altitude above average sea level, in meters, of the origin of the local simulated frame.

SENS_MAG_FIELD_E.description: Local magnetic field in the East direction in Gauss.

SENS_MAG_FIELD_N.description: Local magnetic field in the North direction in Gauss.

SENS_MAG_FIELD_U.description: Local magnetic field in the up direction in Gauss.

SENS_ACC_NOISE_STD.description: Standard deviation of the accelerometer noise in meters per second square.

SENS_GYRO_NOISE_STD.description: Standard deviation of the gyro noise in radians per second.

SENS_MAG_NOISE_STD.description: Standard deviation of the magnetometer noise in Gauss.

SENS_BAR_NOISE_STD.description: Standard deviation of the barometer noise in hectopascal.

SENS_GPS_STD_XY.description: Standard deviation on the horizontal position given by the GPS in meters.

SENS_GPS_STD_Z.description: Standard deviation on the vertical position given by the GPS in meters.
